html:
1.30.18  8:32 pm   Is there a deeper meaning to the videos like "soap tips" and "maybe I can eat blades of grass"? 

     by coincidence, those 2 videos have the same meaning. (1.30.18  7:23 pm, 10.11.17  10:32 am)

1.30.18  8:31 pm   Whats ur goal with this videos Just chilling ? The things you do kinda empty not with soul but there are no goal for it maybe you should move on the series History Of.... ?

     sounds like a boring idea

1.30.18  8:29 pm   i'm bill wurtz now

     ah, #relatable

1.30.18  8:28 pm   Why was there a rock with a plaid shirt?

     seemed like a stupid idea. but now that i think about it it might be kind of smart

1.30.18  8:26 pm   any advice on finding love?

     it's impossible, but it will happen anyway

1.30.18  8:22 pm   How do I deal with this really annoying stepmom I have?

     invite your spouse to live with you also

1.30.18  8:14 pm   As an artist, are you ever irritated by the idea that good art can only be created as a result of negative emotions?

     i don't find that to be true

1.30.18  8:11 pm   do you prefer water or soup

     water

1.30.18  8:10 pm   How long has his question page been a thing?

     it's been here since 3.31.16, and before that i was taking questions on another site

1.30.18  8:08 pm   what's your feeling on adjectives 

     wonderful, admirable

1.30.18  8:07 pm   did you upload history of the world the night before the AP world history exam on purpose? or are you just a psychic and knew i needed a good review bc seriously thanks

     1.22.18  6:19 pm

1.30.18  8:06 pm   Are you a potato?

     i will check
1.30.18  8:04 pm   Where did you get the music for your videos? Or perhaps you made them yourself?

1.30.18  8:01 pm   Where do damien maymdien's arms go when he's not holding them up? 

     his arms are imaginary. you can only see them when being imagined, for gestures and so forth

1.30.18  8:01 pm   hey bill can i get a quote to use as my senior quote?

      1.28.18  12:09 pm

1.30.18  7:59 pm   what does your favorite pair of socks look like?

     black

1.30.18  7:58 pm   Do you like it or hate it when people send in questions quoting your videos?

     it can be fun, like a nice game of dodge ball

1.30.18  7:55 pm   Do you have a name for that low-pitched crunchy synth tone that you use during the rock with the plaid shirt part? 

     i call that one 'microwave.' it was born sometime during history of the entire world

1.30.18  7:52 pm   how do you learn to sing nice

     sing on a regular basis. it's as simple as that

1.30.18  7:51 pm   Have you ever typed a capital letter?

     yes

1.30.18  7:45 pm   In your new video, damien skips one of the questions. What was it going to say?

     do u kno da wae

1.30.18  7:44 pm   how/why did you become so abstract?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.30.18  7:41 pm   The title of your newest video is "maybe i could eat blades of grass". That is also the first line. That is the only time it talks about grass, so it doesn't really give an explanation. What does it mean?

     it means the possibility of eating grass remains open, even if the option is not exercised in the video

1.30.18  7:39 pm   would you ever consider collaborating with other artists?

     i don't know how but sure

1.30.18  7:35 pm   If I try hard enough will I find you on tinder?

     no

1.30.18  7:34 pm   hey damien maymdien, why is a rock wearing a plaid shirt so dumb and stupid?

     i actually think it's kind of smart

1.30.18  7:31 pm   How do I add some color to the darkness?

     it depends what medium you are in

1.30.18  7:29 pm   what is the most annoying thing someone could say to you?

     i can't tell you

1.30.18  7:23 pm   what was maybe i could eat blades of grass about

     writing something deliberately executable in less than 2 weeks

1.30.18  7:23 pm   I've been really into music and art in general for most of my life, but I can never seem to understand how someone makes music. Just the idea of playing instruments and figuring out what sounds to put together baffles me, I can't wrap my head around it. I've tried to learn a few instruments before and played around in music software, but I still have trouble understanding how people can learn this stuff, let alone create brand new songs. Since you're so multi-talented in music, do you have any advice or tips I guess on creating music when you're in my shoes? Thanks!

     i started experimenting with music at an extremely young age. that seems to be a big advantage. and it is the only way i've ever known

1.30.18  7:18 pm   how do yu think karl marx's dialectical materialism can be applied to animated muic videos

     i'm not sure, i am not familiar with it

1.30.18  7:18 pm   how often do you p a n i c

     i'll have to check my calendar

1.30.18  7:15 pm   is it okay not to be okay?

     is it ok with you

1.30.18  7:03 pm   how many keys are on your keyboard

     61

1.30.18  7:00 pm   don't mean this to sound rude at all, i have a huge amount of respect for you and your work. but do you ever wonder if touring/doing live shows might take away some of the impact your content has on the audience?

     hold your hats there tiger, i haven't even done it yet

      maybe it's just me but i feel like a large part of it is the fact that you *don't* physically connect with the audience. the barrier that is the screen is what makes something specific to you so translatable to others. what do you think

     ah, that reminds me of when people told me reasons why i couldn't do another thing, which i have done since then

1.30.18  6:58 pm   What is the science behind music that feels cheesy? And is it a good thing or bad thing? What is your definition of cheesy? Mine is similar to guilty pleasure. You like it, but you don't want to admit that you like it. And you feel uncomfortable sharing it with others due to self-consciousness and fear of being judged.

     i think you just described everything that ever existed

1.30.18  6:55 pm   why do you miss spell words?

     to keep it interesting

1.30.18  6:54 pm   Which do you think is better for writing music that is catchy and a few layers deep at the same time: complex chord progressions, or simple ones with a twist here and there?

     whether it's complex or simple doesn't matter. the only thing that matters is if someone likes it

1.30.18  6:51 pm   the world is stupid

     yes, and smart

1.30.18  6:50 pm   What kind of surroundings inspire you the most?

     surprise me

1.30.18  6:45 pm   how do i ace my exams?

     try to figure out the answers

1.30.18  6:43 pm   ok when's the next video

     i can't tell you

1.30.18  6:42 pm   hows it shakin bacon! is there a secret meaning behind your vidoes

     4.1.17  5:27 am

1.30.18  6:37 pm   penguins?

     that is a question scientists continue to debate today

1.30.18  6:31 pm   Do you ever feel like punching something?

     i prefer it when things are pre-punched

1.30.18  6:29 pm   Is this a bad question?

     every question is bad, and good

1.30.18  6:20 pm   do you have a particular fascination with trees or the planting of them? they keep showing up in your videos along with a nice chord or two

     that's true. i keep trying to stop but apparently i can't

1.30.18  6:15 pm   are you a little bit sad or a lottle bit sad?

     no

1.30.18  6:14 pm   Does a song usually come to you gradually or all at once?

     usually only some of it, hits me instantly like lightning. and i hastily try to get down as much as i can grasp from that. then it goes into the arvhice and then when it is time to pick that song, i work it to completion

1.30.18  6:12 pm   Do you have any "History of"  videos in the works?

     no

     And if not what can I do to convince you to make more? 

     you would have to convince me to not do all the other things i want to do instead. which would be about has hard as convinving me not to try a history video when i had previously been writing 7 days a week for the vine format, which is what everyone at that time was trying to convince me to do
